content.rendered: We appreciate all the work Ron Gushulak is doing for us, and how he makes himself available, even with the time difference.  Ron responds to my emails late in the day, and even in the later evening hours!  We do miss Greg Hilgendorf, but Ron’s insight and counsel has been top-notch.  Ron’s assistance and guidance with setting up our first PIP was beyond our expectations.  Feeling very appreciative to be backed by such professionals!
